transcript:
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji mam, Shubh baat kar raha tha main IndiaMART se, aapke call aaya tha mam.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji mam, bataiye mam.
Customer: Main yahi puchna chah rahi thi sir ki na daily ki hume kitni leads milti hai aur wo show kahan pe karta hai ki kitni pending hai hamare paas ya kitni usme se use ho chuki hai.
Executive: Aapne abhi IndiaMART apna open kar rakha hai na seller panel?
Customer: Haan, kar rakha hai.
Executive: Buy leads section mein jaiye ek baar.
Customer: One second.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: 30 second mam bas.

Executive: Isme aapko right side mein na niche dekhoge isme balance karke help likha hoga then balance aa raha hoga then buy profile karke aa raha hoga. Theek hai balance mein jaiye ek baar.
Customer: Theek hai, India India balance karke dikh raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan 15.
Executive: Ab main aapko batata hu ye kaise hota hai. Aapko aap TrustSeal services use kar rahe ho to TrustSeal mein aapko weekly jaise isme likha hoga weekly. Weekly aapko 20 milti hai. Daily bonus jo aapki hoti hai wo do hoti hai. Jaise aapne aaj ki do leads consume kar li hongi, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Subah ka aaya.
Executive: To abhi ye zero ho gaya hai. Theek hai ab weekly mein abhi dekho aapki jo lead bachi hui hai na aapne 15 use kari hai, paanch aapki abhi bachi hui hai.
Customer: 15 use ho chuki hai?
Executive: Haan, sorry 15 aapne okay aapki abhi jo lead 15 bachi hui hai.
Customer: Aaj aapke paas 20 hona chahiye na.
Executive: 15 hi bachi hui hai mam aapke abhi jo bachi hui hai na 15 bachi hui hai buy leads.
Customer: Achha 15 bachi hui hai weekly ke according.
Executive: Haan, haan weekly ke according aapki aapki jo lead jo generate hote hai na wo Sunday ki morning mein hoti hai matlab 12:01 pe aapke paas lead aa jati hai 20 plus two.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur abhi tak aapne kitni lead consume ki hai main bata deta hu.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Aapne kal bhi consume ki thi ki mam kuch leads?
Customer: Kal to nahi wo to expire ho chuka tha na.
Executive: Okay to aaj aapne almost saat lead uthai hai mam. Saat lead aapne purchase ki hai aaj. To do wo daily chali gayi aapne paanch se aur jo aapko weekly wale mein dikh raha hai na paanch aap usme se consume haan to 15 total bachi hui hai aapke paas weekly ki.
Customer: To ek din mein hum do use kar sakte hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Achha achha.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To isme aapka ye aa jayega. Baki mam ye aapki na ticket open ho rahi thi mere paas. Aapne aapke paas mera number nahi hai kya? Maine aapko bola bhi tha mera number save kar lo koi bhi dikkat ho aap mujhe call kar sakte ho.
Customer: Wo by mistake lag gaya wo main search out kar rahi thi na. To call lag gaya.
Executive: Haan mam kyunki yahan pe na ticket open ho jati hai jaise aapne 969 se call kiya.
Customer: Wo maine mail me dekha haan.
Executive: To theek hai to main aap ye fir ticket close kar du main aapka bhi koi aur concern iske alawa?
Customer: Nahi abhi to nahi.
Executive: Theek hai mam aur mam ye aapne abhi tak specification aur description add nahi kiya wo main aaj karungi aaj karungi thoda sa busy schedule tha isliye main aaj karungi isko.
Executive: Mam please na kuch hoga query to main call karungi aapko then.
Executive: Theek hai mam aur main ye aapka na ticket close kar de raha hu theek hai. Okay mam thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know daily lead count.

- Wants to know where to check pending leads.



Resolution:

- Explained how to check lead balance.

- Explained weekly and daily lead distribution.

- Informed about lead generation time.

- Informed about leads consumed today.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add specification and description today.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, trustseal, seller panel
